title: What were the experiences of individuals who claimed to be influenced by Mr. Donato's gaze and commands?
first_phrase: In this final part, Auguste Queff, a soldier, denies feeling any electric shocks coming from Mr. Donato during his touch or approach. He admits to being under Mr. Donato's influence without being able to explain how, disconnecting any suggestion of electric agents. Monsieur G. Launay writes to Mr. Donato acknowledging his inability to resist his commands and desires, as if he were under his spell. He attests to Mr. Donato's ability to transform him into a young girl, make him pass imaginary streams, and change his name, all without his consent.
content: XIX G. LAUNAY Monsieur Donato, Je vous écris ces quelques mots non pour augmenter le nombre de vos admirateurs, mais pour convaincre les incrédules. Pour mon compte personnel je puis assurer que lorsque je suis sous la domination de votre regard, il m’est impossible de me soustraire à vos commandements. Votre volonté est la mienne, vos désirs les miens, vos mouvements, vos paroles, vos gestes mêmes sont pour moi autant d’ordres auxquels il m’est matériellement impossible de me soustraire ; je suis obligé do les accomplir avec la plus rigoureuse exactitude. Ainsi, m’ordonniez-vous de me mettre à genoux, à peine vos yeux s’étaient-ils fixés sur les miens qu’il m’était impossible, malgré mes efforts constants et inouïs, de me relever. Vous n DONATO. — LES FASCINÉS PEINTS PAR EUX-MÊMES 297 m’avez aussi transformé en jeune fille, fait passer des ruisseaux imaginaires, changer de nom même, et tout cela sans que je puisse m’y opposer par un moyen quelconque.
last_phrase: In conclusion, Monsieur Donato's power to mesmerize and control others' actions and thoughts is truly fascinating. While some may doubt the effectiveness of his abilities, those who have experienced them firsthand can attest to his incredible powers. Regardless, the evening spent under his spell was a pleasant one, leaving the writer with a sense of gratitude and, surprisingly, a larger appetite. It is regrettable that the experience cannot be repeated, but the memory of it will undoubtedly linger for quite some time.
